If you have any problems installing on VISTA (i.e. error 2739), open a command prompt as an administrator and run the following commands:

regsvr32 c:\windows\system32\vbscript.dll

regsvr32 c:\windows\system32\jscript.dll

To open an admin command prompt, clict on START, then type "cmd" (without quotes), then right click, then click "run as administrator", then type in the above commands or copy and paste them in.  Voila, it will work.
